DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether food ingredient(s) affect glycemic responses.
DOC.criteria: Subject is 1875 years of age Subject has a body mass index (BMI) ≥ 20.0 and < 35 kg/m² at screening (visit 1). Subject has normal fasting serum glucose (<7.0mmol/L capillary corresponding to whole blood glucose <6.3mmol/L). Subject has no health conditions that would prevent him from fulfilling the study requirements as judged by the Investigator on the basis of medical history. Subject understands the study procedures and signs forms providing informed consent to participate in the study and authorization for release of relevant protected health information to the study investigator.
